SELECT message.id, message.device_id, message.`name` AS device_name, sys.`name` AS user_name, inspection.`status`, inspection.description, inspection.patrol_time, inspection.create_time FROM device_inspection AS inspection LEFT JOIN device_message AS message ON message.device_id = inspection.device_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS sys ON sys.user_id = inspection.user_id
